synopsis.text: Boku no Hero Academia's third season unfolds in the heart of summer, as Izuku 'Deku' Midoriya and his fellow aspiring heroes from UA Academy embark on an intense forest training camp. Led by seasoned pro heroes, including the Wild, Wild Pussycats, the students are pushed to their limits to hone their unique abilities, known as Quirks. Amidst the grueling challenges, the camp takes a treacherous turn when the League of Villains, under Shigaraki Tomura's command, infiltrates the camp with a sinister objective: capturing one of the students. Caught in the chaos, Deku and his classmates must rally together, utilizing their newfound skills to fight for their survival and thwart the villains' wicked plans.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
